author: pieterdavid
body:
This PR bundles a few different changes, all related to changing Fireworks code from using PXBDetId, TIBDetId etc. to TrackerTopology.
The solution we converged on, driven by the requirement from the Fireworks side to run the event display with as few dependencies as possible, was to save a copy of trackerParameters.xml with the geometry, and construct a TrackerTopology from it using StandaloneTrackerTopology (also used for some ROOT macros and SiStrip payload inspector plugins), which we propose to move to a separate package (it used to be in CalibTracker/SiStripCommon, which pulled in a number of unrelated cmssw dependencies), and changed to use tinyxml instead of xerces-c for the xml parsing.

Many thanks to @alja for doing the code changes in the Fireworks packages.

CC: @OlivierBondu @alesaggio @vidalm 
Tracked at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/19398
title: Migrate Fireworks from tracker-sub-DetId to TrackerTopology
